title: Pakistan's former prime minister, Imran Khan, shot and wounded
description: Senior aide said it was "an attempt to kill him". Also; UN warning over glacier threat and the World Cup accused of greenwashing.
itunes:subtitle: Senior aide said it was "an attempt to kill him"
itunes:summary: Senior aide said it was "an attempt to kill him". Also; UN warning over glacier threat and the World Cup accused of greenwashing.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
